body.copy: Iâ€™m a problem solver. I'm passionate about finding solutions to complex problems - whether that's finding a new way for a client to do business, or finally fixing a bug in my code. Outside of my career, I try to enjoy all of Colorado's activities as much as I can. You can find me playing volleyball in Wash Park, taking in a ball game at Coors Field, hitting the slopes in Summit County or trying a new restaurant or brewery in RiNo.
